title: TrainerDay - Adding Recurring Events and Other Sports

transcript.full_text: here's a quick video showing two new features that we've added and add a custom workout or a different kind of workout a non-structured workout and reoccurring events so I'll come in here to my calendar I click on the plus you can now see we have add custom workout so add a workout is a structured workout cycling row ERG or Swim ERG custom workout I will show you is currently running yoga walking and strength so I'll go ahead and hear strength and hit save and I can come in here to these little three dots and click on reoccurrence and I can say repeat each week on Thursdays and there we go and you can see it's reoccurring and if I want to delete them I can delete all of them by or just one or all of them so then I delete them all you also can do that with structured workouts you can also repeat them so you can click reoccurrence you could do that on a ramp test if you wanted repeat it every four weeks or how as often as you wanted um and that's it thank you very much
